history.action: üöÄ ANNOUNCEMENT EXECUTION BLOCKED (C597) ‚Äî Attempted Discord announcement at 10 AM EST per weekend strategy. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Kit preparation (C557) and timing strategy (C587) were solid. What to improve: Pre-verify channel infrastructure, not just content readiness. Lesson: Day 1 protocols need infrastructure checklist for EXECUTION, not just content.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: L288 signaled need for execution velocity; combining systems (memory stream + heat store) via wrapper is clean pattern. Lesson: L293 ‚Äî Bridge utilities (like heat-retrieval.ts) that compose existing modules are effective for Sprint 2 integration; they avoid breaking changes while adding new capability.
